item.title: Docker Usage
item.description: Docker ê¸°ë³¸ ëª…ë ¹ì–´ docker ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ ìƒì„± ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆë¼ë¦¬ í†µì‹ í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•œ ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ nw1 ìƒì„± DB Oracle 11g 12c ë²„ì „ë„ ìˆì§€ë§Œ 11g ì‚¬ìš©í•¨ ğŸ˜ https://github.com/MaksymBilenko/dockerâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Docker

ê¸°ë³¸ ëª…ë ¹ì–´

# ì‹œì‘ / ì¤‘ì§€
$ docker start(stop) <ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆëª…>

# ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ í”„ë¡œì„¸ìŠ¤ í™•ì¸
$ docker ps -a

# ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ ì‚­ì œ
$ docker rm <ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆëª…>

# ì´ë¯¸ì§€ í™•ì¸
$ docker images

# ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ì‚­ì œ
$ docker rmi <ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ì•„ì´ë””>
$ docker rmi $(docker images -f "dangling=true" -q)

# ë¡œê·¸ ì¶œë ¥
$ docker logs -f <ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆëª…>
$ docker logs -f --tail 30 <ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆëª…>

# docker bash ì ‘ì†
$ docker exec -it <ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆëª…> /bin/bash

# ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ ì •ë³´
$ docker inspect <ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆëª…>

# docker-compose ì‚¬ìš©
## ë°±ê·¸ë¼ìš´ë“œ ìƒì„±
$ docker-compose up -d

## ì¤‘ì§€ í›„ ì‚­ì œ
$ docker-compose down

## docker build
$ docker build --tag m9752/system1:1.0 .

## docker hub push
$ docker push m9752/system1:1.0

docker ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ ìƒì„±

ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆë¼ë¦¬ í†µì‹ í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•œ ë„¤íŠ¸ì›Œí¬ nw1 ìƒì„± 

$ docker network create -d bridge nw1
# network ì •ë³´
$ docker network inspect nw1

[DB] Oracle 11g

  • 12c ë²„ì „ë„ ìˆì§€ë§Œ 11g ì‚¬ìš©í•¨ ğŸ˜ https://github.com/MaksymBilenko/docker-oracle-12c

    ìƒì„±

  • docker run
$ docker run -d --name ora11g \
    -p 49160:8080 \
    -p 49161:1521 \
    -v /home/test/docker/oracle/data:/u01/app/oracle \ 
    jaspeen/oracle-xe-11g
  • docker-compose
version: "3.0"

services:
  web:
    image: 'jaspeen/oracle-xe-11g'
    #restart: always
    container_name: ora11g
    ports:
      - '49160:8080'
      - '49161:1521'
    volumes:
      - '/home/test/docker/oracle/data:/u01/app/oracle'

networks:
  default:
    external:
      name: nw1

user ê¸°ë³¸ ì •ë³´

  • hostname: localhost
  • port: 1521
  • sid: xe
  • username/password: system / oracle
  • Password for SYS & SYSTEM: oracle
  • sqlplus ì ‘ì† : sqlplus sys as sysdba
  • ì°¸ì¡° : https://github.com/jaspeen/oracle-11g
-- íŒ¨ìŠ¤ì›Œë“œ ë³€ê²½ ì‹œ
ALTER USER SYS IDENTIFIED BY "<password>";
ALTER USER SYSTEM IDENTIFIED BY "<password>";

í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ (system1) jdbc ì ‘ì† ì •ë³´

  • net.sf.log4jdbc.sql.jdbcapi.DriverSpy
  • jdbc:log4jdbc:oracle:thin:@127.0.0.1:49161:xe

ì‹œê°„ ë° íƒ€ì„ì¡´ ë³€ê²½

$ docker exec -it ora11g /bin/bash
$ date                  # ì‹œê°„ í™•ì¸
$ date --set='+9 hours' # ì‹œê°„ ë³€ê²½
-- íƒ€ì„ì¡´ í™•ì¸
SELECT DBTIMEZONE FROM dual;

[DB] mariadb

ìƒì„±

  • docker run
$ docker run -d --name mariadb \
    -p 3306:3306 \
    -v /home/test/mariadb/data:/var/lib/mysql \
    -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=<password> \
    mariadb:10.2
  • docker-compose
version: "3.0"

services:
  web:
    image: 'mariadb:10.2'
    #restart: always
    container_name: mariadb
    environment:
        - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=dkssud
    ports:
      - '3306:3306'
    volumes:
      - '/home/test/mariadb/data:/var/lib/mysql'

networks:
  default:
    external:
      name: nw1

[DB] mysql

ìƒì„±

# xwiki ìœ ì €
$ docker run -d --name mysql \
    --net=nw1 \
    -p 3306:3306 \
    -v /home/test/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql \
    -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=<password> \
    -e MYSQL_USER=xwiki \
    -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=xwiki \
    -e MYSQL_DATABASE=xwiki \
    --character-set-server=utf8 \
    --collation-server=utf8_bin \
    --explicit-defaults-for-timestamp=1 \
    mysql:5.7 

# sonarqube ìœ ì €
$ docker run -d --name mysql \
    --net=nw1 \
    -p 13306:3306 \
    -v /home/test/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql \
    -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=<password> \
    -e MYSQL_USER=sonar \
    -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=sonar \
    -e MYSQL_DATABASE=sonar \
    --character-set-server=utf8 \
    --collation-server=utf8_bin \
    --explicit-defaults-for-timestamp=1 \
    --max-allowed-packet=33554432 \
    mysql:5.7

max_allowed_packet ê°’ ì„¤ì •

/** ë³€ê²½ì „ ê°’ í™•ì¸ **/
show variables where Variable_name = 'max_allowed_packet';

/** íŒ¨í‚·ì‚¬ì´ì¦ˆ 1Gë¡œ ì¦ê°€ 
    SET GLOBAL max_allowed_packet = 1024 * 1024 * 32; --ë™ì‘í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ
**/

SET GLOBAL max_allowed_packet = 1073741824; 

/** ê°’ í™•ì¸ **/
show variables where Variable_name = 'max_allowed_packet';

[git] Gitlab

ìƒì„± (docker-compose)

  • docker-compose
version: "3.0"

services:
  web:
    image: 'gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest'
    hostname: 'gitlab.example.com'
    container_name: gitlab
    environment:
      GITLAB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG: |
        external_url 'http://gitlab.example.com'
        # Add any other gitlab.rb configuration here, each on its own line
    ports:
      - '11080:80'
      - '11443:443'
      - '11022:22'
    volumes:
      - '/home/test/docker/gitlab/config:/etc/gitlab'
      - '/home/test/docker/gitlab/logs:/var/log/gitlab'
      - '/home/test/docker/gitlab/data:/var/opt/gitlab'
      - '/home/test/docker/gitlab/backups:/var/opt/gitlab/backups'

networks:
  default:
    external:
      name: nw1

[CI/CD] jenkins

ìƒì„±

  • docker-compose
version: "3.0"

services:
  web:
    #image: 'jenkins/jenkins:lts'
    image: 'getintodevops/jenkins-withdocker:lts'
    #restart: always
    container_name: jenkins
    ports:
      - '8200:8080'
      - '50200:50000'
    expose:
      - '8080'
      - '50000'
    volumes:
      - '/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock'
      - '/home/test/docker/jenkins_home:/var/jenkins_home'
    environment:
      TZ: "Asia/Seoul"

networks:
  default:
    external:
      name: nw1

[WEB/WAS] tomcat

  • tomcat9 - jdk11 ë²„ì „ ìƒì„±

  • Dockerfile ì°¸ì¡°

    • openjdk-buster : https://github.com/docker-library/tomcat/blob/master/9.0/jdk11/openjdk-buster/Dockerfile

ìƒì„± (docker-compose)

  • Dockerfileë¡œ tomcat9:1.0 ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ìƒì„±
# ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ìƒì„±
$ docker build --tag tomcat9:1.0 .

ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ ìƒì„±

  • docker run
$ docker run -d -p 23456:8080 --name tomcat9 tomcat9:1.0 \ 
			-v /home/test/docker/tomcat9/conf:/usr/local/tomcat/conf \
			-v /home/test/docker/tomcat9/logs:/usr/local/tomcat/logs \
			-v /home/test/docker/tomcat9/webapps:/usr/local/tomcat/webapps
  • docker-compose
version: "3.0"

services:
  web:
    image: 'tomcat9:1.0'
    #restart: always
    container_name: tomcat9
    ports:
      - '48080:8080'
    volumes:
      - '/home/test/docker/tomcat9/conf:/usr/local/tomcat/conf'
      - '/home/test/docker/tomcat9/logs:/usr/local/tomcat/logs'
      - '/home/test/docker/tomcat9/webapps:/usr/local/tomcat/webapps'
      - '/home/test/docker/tomcat9/secure:/usr/local/secure'

networks:
  default:
    external:
      name: nw1

[í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸] system1

  • ê°„ë‹¨í•œ Spring ê¸°ë°˜ ì›¹ í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸

ìƒì„±

  • Dockerfile ë¡œ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ìƒì„±
# 1. system1 ë°°í¬ìš© docker image ìƒì„±
FROM tomcat9:1.0

# 2. server ì„¤ì •
COPY ./server-setting/*.* /usr/local/tomcat/conf/

# 3. í‚¤íŒŒì¼ ì„¤ì •
COPY ./s1-secure/k1.md /usr/local/secure/
COPY ./s1-secure/other/k2.md /usr/local/secure/other/

# 4. war ë³µì‚¬
COPY ./target/system1.war /usr/local/tomcat/webapps

mysql DB ì„¤ì •

CREATE DATABASE sonar CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_bin; 
CREATE USER 'sonar'@'%' identified by 'sonar';
CREATE USER 'sonar'@'localhost' identified by 'sonar';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON sonar.* TO 'sonar'@'%' identified by 'sonar';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON sonar.* TO 'sonar'@'localhost' identified by 'sonar';
commit;

-- í™•ì¸
select * from user;  
select * from db;

-- íŒ¨ìŠ¤ì›Œë“œ ë³€ê²½
UPDATE mysql.user SET authentication_string=PASSWORD('<password>') WHERE user='sonar';
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
commit;

ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ ìƒì„±

$ docker run -d --name sonarqube --net=nw1 \ 
    -p 49000:9000 -p 49092:9092 \
    -e SONARQUBE_JDBC_USERNAME=sonar \
    -e SONARQUBE_JDBC_PASSWORD=<password> \
    -e SONARQUBE_JDBC_URL='jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/sonar?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8&rewriteBatchedStatements=true&useConfigs=maxPerformance' \
    sonarqube

sonar-scanner.properties

#Configure here general information about the environment, such as SonarQube server connection details for example
#No information about specific project should appear here
#----- Default SonarQube server
sonar.host.url=http://localhost:9000

#----- Default source code encoding
sonar.sourceEncoding=UTF-8

sonar.login=admin
sonar.password=<admin íŒ¨ìŠ¤ì›Œë“œ>

sonar-project.properties

# must be unique in a given SonarQube instance
sonar.projectKey=solution:<SonarQube instance ID>

# this is the name and version displayed in the SonarQube UI. Was mandatory prior to SonarQube 6.1.
sonar.projectName=<í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ëª…>
sonar.projectVersion=<ë²„ì „>
 
# Path is relative to the sonar-project.properties file. Replace "\" by "/" on Windows.
# This property is optional if sonar.modules is set. 
sonar.sources=.
sonar.java.binaries=./target/classes
 
# Encoding of the source code. Default is default system encoding
sonar.sourceEncoding=UTF-8
